function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration","Impact":"Increased risk of circulating airborne viruses and contaminants","Mitigation":"Installation of HEPA filters and regular maintenance","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building managers, healthcare facility managers"},{"Description":"Poor ventilation","Impact":"Increased concentration of airborne viruses and reduced air quality","Mitigation":"Utilization of heat recovery units and optimal ventilation system design","Technologies":"Heat recovery units, ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building designers, HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Reliance on unreliable energy supply","Impact":"Disruption of healthcare services and building functions during power outages","Mitigation":"Installation of reliable power supply systems and local renewable energy sources","Technologies":"Backup generators, solar panels, energy storage systems","People":"Healthcare facility managers, building managers","Owner":"Facility management, local energy providers"}]}
